faqs.question: Can Non-Resident Indians NRI purchase land or plots in Sector 22 Noida
faqs.answer: Yes, Non-Resident Indians are legally permitted to purchase immovable property in India including residential plots in Sector 22 Noida. faqs.question: What are the restrictions on construction and height in Sector 22 Noida residential plots
